sentences.sentence: Some animals were meant to carry each other, to live symbiotically for a lifetime – star-crossed lovers, monogamous swans. We are not those animals.
sentences.translation: 有些动物生来就是为了互相扶持，一辈子都要生活在一起的——时运不济的恋人，一夫一妻制的天鹅。我们不是那些动物。

sentences.sentence: Growth is the only evidence of life.
sentences.translation: 成长是生命的唯一证据。

sentences.sentence: If we survive danger it steels our courage more than anything else.
sentences.translation: 如果我们在危险中生存下来，它将比任何东西都更能增强我们的勇气。

sentences.sentence: You have a whole life ahead of you.
We Chinese have a saying: If a man plants melons, he will reap melons; if he sows beans, he will reap beans.
sentences.translation: 我们中国人有句谚语说：“种瓜得瓜，种豆得豆。”
